column5: It looked as if you were starting
But even in Heimmel's normal climate,
if I remember correctly, it was written
Noi, can't you make the climate
...For the Astrolabe as it is right
now, this is the best it can do.
(But...my sister can no longer be saved...)
(I don't want to give up, but...
we can't do any more than this...)
Kureha, what exactly did you do!?
My body just...moved on its own...
The Shining Wing of the Mythos appears
Power of the Stars, and resurrected
I... can do things like this...?
Though, I'm glad it was useful to you.
Is there something on my face?
I should be thanking both you
Everything is thanks to Master Kureha!
I have to bring as much as I can!
Parting with both of them at the garden,
